Articles.Content:
> 
> It's not funny, for an hour you had all the forum members hating you, whoever at Squad thought this would be funny needs some serious help.

An hour? It took *an hour* to realize it was a joke?

Geez, i'm already angry at the snow outside...

Ok, now to clam down, and laugh at their wonderful joke, then watch the fallout. Right?

**Nope, it is till not remotely funny.** 

I believed in them because 1.0 BS.

G<expletive>G Squad.</expletive>
Maybe just MAYBE April fools jokes are supposed to be done on April fools day...

> 
> I love how he says check your calendars. If everything here had been postponed another hour, my calendar would CLEARLY say April the 2nd.
> As would pretty much >50% of the worlds. Still does in fact.

You should recheck the post... They never said 'in a week and a half'... They said 'a week from wednesday'... And 7 days after a wednesday will still be a wednesday...

> 
> I love how he says check your calendars. If everything here had been postponed another hour, my calendar would CLEARLY say April the 2nd.
> As would pretty much >50% of the worlds. Still does in fact.

Is there a way to hand out negative rep? Because I can think of someone who deserves some.

I won't say who, Kasper wont like that. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Please see OP. Edit: Don't lock, let people vent.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-20T22:26:18Z" title="03/20/2015 10:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 20, 2015</time> by Robotengineer**

It actually was pretty funny when you think about it, but it seriously needed either an "April Fools!" note at the bottom, or a release closer to April. I did like the humor though, once I thought about it. The paid subscriptions should have tipped us off.

Face it, the mods got us. The mods got us good. But it REALLY needed an indication that it was a joke ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Upsilon Aerospace apparently got a PM and it is a joke after all.
I still can't believe they thought this was a good idea.

> 
> Upsilon Aerospace apparently got a PM and it is a joke after all.

I PM'd KasperVid as well, got the same response.
No, don't lock. People are still pissed off and that anger has to be vented!

Lord help us if it's not....

But it is, right?
While it may not have been funny, they got us good. REAL good

> 
> Please see OP. I would like to request a lock.

I would like to request that they edit the announcement post with "Happy 1st of April" or something similar

> 
> Lord help us if it's not.... But it is, right?

Er, yes.

I'm thinking there's deeper meaning to this though; perhaps March 20th means something?

Is it the birthdate of Loki in Norse mythology? We need to figure this out!

If this is a joke, they must have known it would make everyone angry. If they made everyone angry by telling the joke, they'd want to make them happy again. This could be accomplished by releasing 1.0. on the day they claim they're going to implement this update.

> 
> If this is a joke, they must have known it would make everyone angry. If they made everyone angry by telling the joke, they'd want to make them happy again. This could be accomplished by releasing 1.0. on the day they claim they're going to implement this update.

Nice try ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> If this is a joke, they must have known it would make everyone angry. If they made everyone angry by telling the joke, they'd want to make them happy again. This could be accomplished by releasing 1.0. on the day they claim they're going to implement this update.

That might actually make people *more* angry about getting an unfinished product.

It's still terrible. Even if it is a joke.

It's a cruel joke. It's not even a joke.

And don't post it in "Announcements" if it's a joke...

> 
> While it may not have been funny, they got us good. REAL good

I disagree. What if they had made this post in January and said that the forum changes would take effect in April and then admitted in a PM that it was all an April Fool's joke?

That's not smart humor. That's bad taste.

There's a reason why April 1st pranks happen ***ON*** April 1st. So crap like this doesn't happen, and we can all have a laugh about it. Now, though, Squad's got a borderline ***PR CRISIS*** on their hands because not everyone is going to figure it out in a timely manner.

> 
> That might actually make people *more* angry about getting an unfinished product.

Theyre shipping an unfinished product no matter what. So yeah, pfft.

- - - Updated - - -

Now the community has been pissed, as far as I am aware Green iron Crown was an experiment in how much negative rep can be gotten on this forum.

Let us try this "experiment" again.

> 
> I would like to request that they edit the announcement post with "Happy 1st of April" or something similar

Yes, something this hot-button shouldn't require folks to do math. "These awesome changes to this forum, requested by everyone on reddit and twitter, will go live on April 1!" And even after that, it was written with such good detail, that I'd probably fall for it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> If this is a joke, they must have known it would make everyone angry. If they made everyone angry by telling the joke, they'd want to make them happy again. This could be accomplished by releasing 1.0. on the day they claim they're going to implement this update.

It would be nice, but what? 1% possibility?

> 
> If this is a joke, they must have known it would make everyone angry. If they made everyone angry by telling the joke, they'd want to make them happy again. This could be accomplished by releasing 1.0. on the day they claim they're going to implement this update.

If they REALLY want to make some of us happy, what they are planning as 1.0 will be released as .27 (or even .99).
